Class Battle

java.lang.Object
  model.Battle

public class Battle
extends java.lang.Object

Class the handles the events of a battle.

defeatMonsters

public void defeatMonsters()
                    throws EndGameException
Causes players to go up levels and calculates treasures won by defeating the remaining monsters in the battle.

Throws:
EndGameException - if any player went up enough levels to win

                           boolean alsoDiscardMate)

Parameters:
monster - Monster Card of the monster to remove
alsoDiscardMate - whether or not a monster's mate should also be discarded

leaveTreasuresBehind

public void leaveTreasuresBehind()
Sets the calculated number of treasures won to zero; IE. the players get no treasure.
